        Generates all the possible combinations with the number of pegs and colors given
        Parameters:
        position - is the index of the position that is being added
        pegs - is the number of pegs in the combination
        colors - is the number of different possible colors in a combination

      • breakerGuess

        public ColorRow breakerGuess(int pegs,
                             int colors)
        Evaluates which is the combination that will eliminate more possible combinations. To do it, first it searches for each combination the minimum eliminated for each ControlRow, and chooses the maximum of these minimums.
        Specified by:
        breakerGuess in class Player
        Parameters:
        pegs - is the number of pegs in the combination
        colors - is the number of different possible colors in a combination
        Returns:
        the combination that is going to be tried
